name: Hammer Time (Dodooligist)
description:
its really broken so I recommend downloading it for optimal experience.

after being kicked out of the supernatural beings association by bill cipher and cthulu, weird head man must escape the lake by duplicating hammers.

WASD to move, ctrl to sprint/high jump, left click and drag to move hammers, right click to duplicate hammers.

note: the webgl build doesn't contain the intro cutscene for some reason, but basically the weird guy is kicked in the face and now he is in a lake. also title screen is broken in webgl. you can still click play tho.
